name: Buy-Lo / Sell-Fi: Lo-Fi Chill Beats to Space Trade To
name_original: Buy-Lo / Sell-Fi: Lo-Fi Chill Beats to Space Trade To
description:
NOTE: This game will be available to be downloaded and played single player, but is meant to be played on live stream. The live stream is hosted here: https://www.twitch.tv/jeo77 Credits

Art / Animation - Andy Wood (@AndreaaCW)

Audio - Mike Romaniak (@MikeRomaniak)

Programming / Technical -
Alain Bellemare (@Al_Bellemare)
George Degenkamp (@jeo77)

How To Play: 
  • all interaction is done through the console 
  • make your way through the galaxy buying, selling and trading, try to make as much as you can
  • don't forget to fill your fuel tank!
  •  to check your status or available commands at any time, type 'help' or 'info'

Example Commands: 

  • info
  • info self 
  • info location
  • help

Example Trade Station Commands: 

  • buy 5 water 
  • buy plants 1
  • sell 1 contraband
  • set

Example Choose Destination Commands: (pick location option)

  • 1 
  • 1 Lily Colony
